verbose_text: WNT6 silencing also resulted in decreased phosphorylation of HSP27, an anti-apoptotic protein XREF_BIBR associated with increased cell proliferation and decreased Fas induced apoptosis in prostate cancer XREF_BIBR, and was shown to mediate the activation of p38 / ERK (MAPK) pro survival signaling in cervical cancer cells XREF_BIBR.
